AddDeviceForm.addressDesc: Adireshin cibiyar sadarwa na iya zama IP da kafa kaman '192.168.0.100:8080' ko URL kamar 'misali.com':

AddDeviceForm.nameDesc: Zaɓi suna na wannan waya don tunawa da anjima
AddDeviceForm.tryingToConnect: Ana ƙoƙarin haɗuwa da rumbun ajiyar bayanai …
BirthYearSelect.birthyearAriaLabel: Duba bayani game da bada shekarun haihuwar ka.
ChooseAdmin.description: Zaɓi wani da zai kula da tashoshi da asusu
CommonProfileStrings.useAdminAccount: Yi amfani da shafin mai gudanarwa
CommonSyncStrings.changeLater: Kana iya canza wannan a saitin zauren karatunka nan gaba.
CommonSyncStrings.devicesUnreachable: Wasu na'urori ba su karbawa. Dubi sabis ɗinka ka sake gwadawa
CommonSyncStrings.distinctFacilityNameEx: Wannan cibiyar daban ne da '{facilities}'. Waɗannan cibiyoyin basa haɗuwa da juna.
CommonSyncStrings.onMyOwn: Domin karatu a gida da kuma amfani na kashin kai
CommonSyncStrings.superAdminPermissionsD: Wannan asusun babban admin zai ba ka damar kuka da kayan karatu da ma masu amfani da su
CommonSyncStrings.warningFirstImportedIs: A kula: Za a bai wa mai amfani na farko da ka zaɓi shigarwa matsayin babban admin kan wannan na'ura, kuma zai iya sarrafa duk na'urori da saitikansu.
ConfirmAccountDetails.confirmAccountUser: Za a hada asusunka da wannan asusu '{target_facility}'. Za ka bukaci amfani da suna da kalmar sirri.
ConfirmAccountUsername.confirmAccountLin: Za ka shiga wajen karatu '{target_facility}' a matsayinka na '{username}'.
Za ka yi amfani da wannan suna ko ka kirkir sabon asusu na '{target_facility}'.
ConfirmChangeFacility.changeFacilityInfo: Kana kokarin tura asusunka zuwa naka da cigabana bayanai zuwa ga kayan karatu na '{target_facility}' . Amma sauran bayanka suna nan kuma kana iya shiga don tuntubar admin ko yaushe.
Asusunka zai canza zuwa 'mai karatu' '{role}' saboda haka ba zaka iya canza kayan wannan waya ba. Zaka iya iya neman taimakon wani da iznin admin '{facility}' domon komawa zuwa naka iri '{role}'.
Kana iya neman asusu a '{target_facility}' don hada su. Bayanai a asusun biyu zasu hadu zuwa daya tilo.
ConfirmMerge.confirmMergeInfoLine: Za ka haɗa asusu biyu tare da bayanansu. Bayanai da ake kan yi sun haɗa da hirarraki da kayayyaki, lokaci da maki. Wannan ba zai yiwuwu ba.
CreatePassword.description: ‘{targetFacility}’ na bukatar asusu mai kalmar sirri. Shigar da kalmar sirri da kake son amfani da ita don ‘{username}’ cikin ‘{targetFacility}’
CreatePassword.hint: Kana iya saka kalmar sirri idan kana da.
MergeAccountDialog.doNotKnowPassword: Ba ka san kalmar sirri ba?
MergeAccountDialog.incorrectPasswordErro: Kalmar shigar ba daidai yake ba
MergeAccountDialog.mergeAccountUserInfo: Shigar sa kalmar sirrin asusun '{username}' cikin farfajiyar koyo ta '{target_facility}' da kake son hadawa da asusunka.
MergeAccountDialog.mergeAccountUsingAdmi: Shigar da sunan mai amfani da kalmar sirri na shugaban zauren koyo ko kuma babbab shugaban zauren koyo '{target_facility}' .
MergeDifferentAccounts.mergeAccountUserI: Shigar da sunan mai amfani na wannan asusu sa kake son hada asusunka sa shi.
MergeDifferentAccounts.userDoesNotExist: Ba a samu sunan a wannan zauren koyo ba
MergeFacility.failedTaskError: Kayan hadawa '{username}' bai yi nasara ba saboda matsalar joni da '{target_facility}'. Ka duba ingancin sabis naka sannan ka sake gwadawa.
MergeFacility.success: An yi nasarar shiga zauren karatu na '{target_facility}' .
MergeFacility.userAdminError: Mai amfanin '{username}' tuntuni nanan cikin '{target_facility}' kuma shi ba mai koyo ba ne. Zabi wani sunan mai amfani.
MergeFacility.userExistsError: Sunan mai amfani '{username}' na a cikin '{target_facility}'. Ka zabi wani daban.

ProfilePage.changeLearningFacilityDescri: Je da asusunka da bayananka zuwa waani zauren koyo.
ProfilePage.learnModalLine1: Zauren koyo na nufin inda zaka yi amfani da Kolibri kamar su makarata, cibiyoyin koyo, ko gidq.
ProfilePage.learnModalLine2: Garzayawa zuwa wani zauren karatu na nufin masu wannan shafin na iya kallon bayanaka.

TaskStrings.unknownUsername: Ba a san mai amfani ba
UsernameExists.changeFacilityInfoLine1: Asusu mai sunan '{username}' na cikin zauren karatu tuntunilready exists in the '{target_facility}'Kana iya hada asusunka da bayansa zuwa wannan asusu.
UsernameExists.changeFacilityInfoLine2: Ko kuma ka kirkiri sabon asusu kuma duk bayanai za su koma a sabon asusu.
